TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlDesigner extends System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner

summary.span: 擴充 的設計模式行為。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供基底類別衍生自元件的設計人員。 provides a base class for designers of components that derive from . 除了方法與功能，繼承自類別，提供額外的方法，以支援擴充，並改變行為的相關聯在設計階段。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the class, provides additional methods to support extending and altering the behavior of an associated at design time. 您可以將設計工具與型別，使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 自訂設計階段行為的概觀，請參閱[擴充設計階段支援](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). ## Examples 下例實作會示範如何處理`MouseEnter`並`MouseLeave`事件，在控制項上繪製，從設計工具的程式碼，並使用一部分介面，以在設計階段加入控制項的屬性。The following example implementation demonstrates handling `MouseEnter` and `MouseLeave` events, drawing on a control from designer code, and using part of the interface to add a property for the control at design time. 下列範例程式碼包含了設計工具和設計工具相關聯的範例使用者控制項。The following sample code contains a designer and a sample user control associated with the designer. 若要建置此範例中，編譯範例類別程式庫、 程式庫的參考新增至 Windows Forms 專案、 將控制項加入 [工具箱] 和控制項的執行個體新增至您的表單。To build this sample, compile the sample into a class library, add a reference to the library to a Windows Forms project, add the control to the Toolbox, and add an instance of the control to your form. 當您指向控制項時，反白顯示的控制項的周邊網路內部的外框，而用來繪製外框的色彩對應至`OutlineColor`列出控制項的設計工具加入至屬性的屬性。When you point to the control, the inner outline of the perimeter of the control is highlighted, and the color used to draw the outline corresponds to the `OutlineColor` property that the designer has added to the properties listed for the control. 加入 System.Design 編譯程式碼範例的組件的參考。Add a reference to the System.Design assembly to compile the code example. [!code-cpp[ControlDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/CPP/controldesignerexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/CS/controldesignerexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/VB/controldesignerexample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property AssociatedComponents As ICollection

summary.span: 取得元件集合，該集合與設計工具管理的元件相關聯。

span.span: Gets the collection of components associated with the component managed by the designer.

value.span: 元件，與設計工具管理的元件相關聯。

span.span: The components that are associated with the component managed by the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指示任何複製或移動複本，在設計工具所管理的元件以及元件拖曳，或移動作業。This property indicates any components to copy or move along with the component managed by the designer during a copy, drag, or move operation. 如果這個集合包含目前的設計模式文件中的其他元件的參考，這些元件以及元件設計工具管理複製作業期間複製。If this collection contains references to other components in the current design mode document, those components will be copied along with the component managed by the designer during a copy operation. 選取設計工具所管理的元件時，這個集合會填入任何巢狀控制項。When the component managed by the designer is selected, this collection is filled with any nested controls. 此集合也可以包含其他元件，例如工具列的按鈕。This collection can also include other components, such as the buttons of a toolbar.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void BaseWndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed

param.name: m
param.span: 要處理的 。

summary.span: 處理 Windows 訊息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會導致訊息處理的 Windows，略過控制項。This method causes the message to be processed by Windows, skipping the control. 如果您想要封鎖到控制項，取得訊息，但不是想封鎖者進入 Windows 本身，因為它會造成其他產生的訊息，這非常有用。This is useful if you want to block the message from getting to the control, but you do not want to block it from getting to Windows itself because it can cause other messages to be generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法適合用來測試是否控制項可以特定類型之父代的父代。This method is useful for testing whether a control can be parented by a particular type of parent. 例如，控制項只由父代控制項。For example, controls can only be parented by controls. > [!NOTE] > 從拖曳項目時，不會呼叫此方法**工具箱**拖曳至設計介面。This method is not called when an item is dragged from the **Toolbox** onto the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次呼叫的其他物件。當覆寫，請小心不要參考先前處置呼叫中的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需詳細資訊並，請參閱 [清除設定未受管理的 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: protected bool EnableDesignMode (System.Windows.Forms.Control child, string name);
.method familyhidebysig instance bool EnableDesignMode(class System.Windows.Forms.Control child, string name) cil managed
Protected Function EnableDesignMode (child As Control, name As String) As Boolean

param.name: child
param.span: 將啟用設計模式的子控制項。

span.span: The child control for which design mode will be enabled.

param.name: name
param.span: 公開給使用者的 child 名稱。

span.span: The name of child as exposed to the end user.

summary.span: 啟用子控制項的設計階段功能。

span.span: Enables design time functionality for a child control.

returns.span: 如果可以啟用設計階段的子控制項，則為 ，如果裝載基礎結構不支援它，則為 。

span.span: if the child control could be enabled for design time; if the hosting infrastructure does not support it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的子控制項`child`是此控制項設計工具控制項的子系。The child control specified by `child` is a child of this control designer's control. 子系不會直接參與持續性，但不是會如果它公開為主控制項的屬性。The child does not directly participate in persistence, but it will if it is exposed as a property of the main control. 請考慮這類控制項： 有兩個面板`Panel1`和`Panel2`。Consider a control like the : it has two panels, `Panel1` and `Panel2`. 這些面板會公開透過唯讀並上的屬性控制項。These panels are exposed through read only and properties on the control. 控制項的設計工具呼叫每個面板中，以允許其他元件，以在其上卸除。The control's designer calls for each panel, which allows other components to be dropped on them. 但為了讓的內容並要儲存控制項本身必須公開為公用屬性面板。But, in order for the contents of and to be saved, the control itself must expose the panels as public properties. 控制項名稱必須是唯一的控制項設計工具中，但並不需要是唯一的相對於其他控制項設計工具的子系。Control names must be unique within a control designer, but they are not required to be unique with respect to the children of other control designers. 若要支援這項功能，裝載的基礎結構必須公開 （expose)以透過網站服務的類別。To support this feature, the hosting infrastructure must expose the class as a service through the site.

span.span: or is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值`false`指定控制項不能在設計階段拖曳至其本身的子系。The default value of `false` specifies that a control cannot have children dragged onto it at design time. 若要允許控制項在設計階段父其他控制項，其關聯設計工具衍生自。To allow a control to parent other controls at design time, associate it with a designer that derives from .

Public Overridable Function GetGlyphs (selectionType As GlyphSelectionType) As GlyphCollection

param.name: selectionType

A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，根據`selectionType`，則傳回的物件將代表其中一個選取項目狀態：Note that based on `selectionType`, the objects returned will represent one of these selection states: - 完整且可調整大小的選取範圍框線的抓取控點;A fully resizable selection border with grab handles; - 鎖定的選取範圍框線;A locked selection border; - 單一 'hidden' 選取。A single 'hidden' selection .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetHitTest(valuetype System.Drawing.Point point) cil managed
abstract member GetHitTest : System.Drawing.Point -> bool override this.GetHitTest : System.Drawing.Point -> bool

param.name: point
param.span: ，表示滑鼠按一下的位置，以螢幕座標 (Screen Coordinate) 表示。

span.span: A indicating the position at which the mouse was clicked, in screen coordinates.

summary.span: 指示在指定的點按一下滑鼠是否應由控制項處理。

span.span: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the control.

returns.span: 如果在指定的點按一下是由控制項處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a click at the specified point is to be handled by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷是否指定點上的點選應該傳遞至控制項，當控制項處於設計模式。The method determines whether a click at the specified point should be passed to the control, while the control is in design mode. 您可以覆寫並實作這個方法，以啟用您的控制項，即可在設計階段環境中按。You can override and implement this method to enable your control to receive clicks in the design-time environment. > [!NOTE] > 您可以傳入以螢幕座標中的點方法的類別來取得控制項相對於左上角之點的座標。You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the method of the class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control. 方法稱為回應 WM_NCHITTEST 訊息中，因此它會呼叫每個滑鼠移動。The method is called in response to the WM_NCHITTEST message, so it is called on each mouse move.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會覆寫這個方法。The class overrides this method. 它會查看控制項的預設屬性，而如果它是型別`string`，它會將這個屬性的值設定為元件的名稱。It will look at the default property for the control and, if it is of type `string`, it will set this property's value to the name of the component. 它只是如果設計工具已設有 「 選項 」 服務中的這個選項。It only does this if the designer has been configured with this option in the options service. 這個方法也會將控制項連接至其父代，並將它放。This method also connects the control to its parent and positions it. 如果您覆寫這個方法，您一律應該呼叫基底。If you override this method, you should always call base.

summary.span: 每次必須設定游標時就會接收呼叫。

span.span: Receives a call each time the cursor needs to be set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會處理重新導向和設定資料指標事件的處理。This method handles redirection and handling of the set cursor event. 如果工具箱服務選取工具，這個方法可讓工具箱服務來設定資料指標。If the toolbox service has a tool selected, this method will allow the toolbox service to set the cursor. 選取 UI 服務是否已鎖定的選取項目，或在控制項上沒有位置的屬性，將會設定預設的箭號游標。If the selection UI service has a locked selection, or if there is no location property on the control, the default arrow cursor will be set. 如果使用者正在拖曳的元件，就會設定十字型游標。If a user is dragging a component, the crosshair cursor will be set. 否則四個方向的箭頭游標將以指出可以按一下元件，且移動。Otherwise, a four headed arrow cursor will be set to indicate that the component can be clicked and moved.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)
abstract member WndProc : -> unit override this.WndProc : -> unit

param.name: m
param.span: 要處理的 。

span.span: The to process.

summary.span: 處理 Windows 訊息，並選擇性地傳送它們至控制項。

span.span: Processes Windows messages and optionally routes them to the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 針對每個控制項通常會接收的訊息呼叫這個方法。This method is called for each message the control would usually receive. 這可讓設計工具之前選擇性地路由傳送至控制項前置處理過訊息。This allows the designer to preprocess messages before optionally routing them to the control. 若要將訊息傳送至控制項的方法中，呼叫控制項的設計工具上。To send the message to the control’s method, call on the control's designer. > [!NOTE] > 設計工具中將篩選訊息，因此某些訊息將不會傳送至控制項。The designer filters messages, so some messages will not be sent to the control. 例如，滑鼠訊息攔截由設計工具。For example, mouse messages are intercepted by the designer. 如果這不是您想要的行為，呼叫改。If this is not the behavior you want, call instead. 傳遞`m`做為參數。Pass `m` as a parameter. （選擇性） 您可以改變，或建立新来傳遞至控制項的方法。Optionally, you can alter or create a new to pass to the control's method. 下表顯示訊息的流程。The following table shows the flow of messages. |沒有設計工具Without a designer|與設計工具With a designer| |------------------------|---------------------| |USER32USER32





USER32USER32|USER32USER32

`Control.Designer.` `Control.Designer.`







USER32USER32| 設計工具會藉由取代來攔截訊息控制項上的屬性。The designer intercepts messages by replacing the property on the control. 通常指向內含控制項。Usually, points to the contained within the control. 在設計期間，在設計工具會取代它自己的視窗目標，這和快取的原始值。During design time, the designer replaces this with its own window target, and caches the original value.
